ScuttlePuddle.title: Scuttle Puddle
ScuttlePuddle.desc: The arena is filled with crabs carrying bonus loot.

PrismaticParty.title: Prismatic Party
PrismaticParty.desc: It's the ultimate showdown! All augments are Prismatic this game.

PrismaticPrelude.title: Prismatic Prelude
PrismaticPrelude.desc: This battle begins with a Prismatic augment!

PrismaticFinale.title: Prismatic Finale
PrismaticFinale.desc: Zyra swaps the last augment to prismatic this game.

GoldSubscription.title: Gold Subscription
GoldSubscription.desc: Receive a cash prize at the start of each Stage!

LootSubscription.title: Loot Subscription
LootSubscription.desc: Get highly varied loot at the start of each stage!

CrabRave.title: Crab Rave
CrabRave.desc: The arena is filled with crabs carrying bonus loot. After Stage 5 they are DEADLY HAZARDS.

ComponentAnvil.title: Component Anvils
ComponentAnvil.desc: Choose your weapon! Get two component anvils.

GoldenGala.title: Golden Gala
GoldenGala.desc: Go for the gold with three Gold augments!

ArtifactAnvil.title: Artifact Anvil
ArtifactAnvil.desc: Pick up a signature weapon from this Artifact Anvil.

TrainerGolems.title: Trainer Golems
TrainerGolems.desc: Train your Golem! It has 3 random emblems.
